name: Dance Mate
description:
You are a fabulous bird of paradise whose every move is a joy to behold. It is mating season and all colorful creatures are erupting in beautiful displays of song and dance!

No matter if single or duet, platonic or poly partners, everybody joins the ritual. Most will follow the instructions but there are always a few who know but one way to attract all attention - glorious freestyle!

PS all birds in this game are definitely real birds there is no puppet here move along now.

Made by

@kednar @milanpingel @michaelkoloch
